original_text: The king went to Gibeon to offer sacrifices, for that was the most important high place, and Solomon offered a thousand burnt offerings on that altar.
korean_text: 이에 왕이 제사하러 기브온으로 가니 거기는 산당이 큼이라 솔로몬이 그 제단에 일천 번제를 드렸더니

sentences.original_text: for that was the most important high place
and Solomon offered a thousand burnt offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 솔로몬은 천 번의 번제물을 드렸습니다
